data.name: Sling TV
data.description:
Sling TV is Live TV, Only Better. The #1 Live TV Streaming Service that lets you personalize your channel lineup and save. 
Start with the service best for you, then pick Extras in your favorite genres: Sports, Comedy, Kids, News, Movies, Lifestyle, Spanish, & more. Change your service online anytime.

Over 100 live channels available to stream instantly on all of your favorite devices. Watch your favorite live sports like the NFL & college football, hit TV shows like Fear the Walking Dead, Better Call Saul, SportsCenter, plus 10,000+ hours of on-demand tv shows and movies.

With Sling TV you can get both TV and Cloud DVR on your terms - add it when you want and choose when you watch, for just $5

This is TV on your terms. No paying for useless channels, no long-term contracts, no hidden fees, easy online cancellation.

The Sling Orange service offers 30 channels for just $25/mo â€“ including ESPN, Disney Channel, AMC, TNT, TBS, CNN, A&E, History, and many more.
